## Description {#details}

This assigns and keeps a per-bb relative ordering of load/store instructions in the block that directly load or store an alloca.

This functionality is important because it avoids scanning large basic blocks multiple times when promoting many allocas in the same block.

Definition at line 303 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/promotememorytoregister-cpp">PromoteMemoryToRegister.cpp</a>.

## Private Member Attributes

### InstNumbers {#ae828ecedf0e4f22251e007aa3283ddf6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DenseMap&lt;const Instruction &#42;, unsigned&gt; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;PromoteMemoryToRegister.cpp&#125;::LargeBlockInfo::InstNumbers</>}>
For each instruction that we track, keep the index of the instruction.

The index starts out as the number of the instruction from the start of the block.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/promotememorytoregister-cpp/#l00309">309</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/promotememorytoregister-cpp">PromoteMemoryToRegister.cpp</a>.
